title: Sweetheart Banners Backwards [LOADING]
body: The attached image shows Sweetheart Xayah and Rakan in the loading screen, but they're on the wrong side of each other! Rakan is seen on the left, and Xayah is on the right. A friend of mine found this, and encountered it only once.

replies.body: Hey! Originally when these went to PBE they were reversed, but they went out with them facing the right way. If you are in a queue that doesn't have the Top Jungle Mid ADC Support load screen format, they may not show up like they do in their splash art. It looks like the image was from Summoner's Rift - do you happen to know if it was from a game mode/custom?
